edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.operations

Class NShortestPaths

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.operations.NShortestPaths

  • public class NShortestPaths
extends Object
    N-shortest paths operation. See: M. Mohri, M. Riley, "An Efficient Algorithm for the n-best-strings problem", Proceedings of the International Conference on Spoken Language Processing 2002 (ICSLP '02). See: M. Mohri, "Semiring Framework and Algorithms for Shortest-Distance Problems", Journal of Automata, Languages and Combinatorics, 7(3), pp. 321-350, 2002.
    Author:
    John Salatas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Fst get(Fst fst, int n, boolean determinize)
      Calculates the n-best shortest path from the initial to the final state.
      static float[] shortestDistance(Fst fst)
      Calculates the shortest distances from each state to the final

    • Method Detail

      • shortestDistance

        public static float[] shortestDistance(Fst fst)
        Calculates the shortest distances from each state to the final
        Parameters:
        fst - the fst to calculate the shortest distances
        Returns:
        the array containing the shortest distances

      • get

        public static Fst get(Fst fst,
                      int n,
                      boolean determinize)
        Calculates the n-best shortest path from the initial to the final state.
        Parameters:
        fst - the fst to calculate the nbest shortest paths
        n - number of best paths to return
        determinize - if true the input fst will bwe determinized prior the operation
        Returns:
        an fst containing the n-best shortest paths
